messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Today, a lot of business happens between different countries. Most business people speak English. But how people talk for business is very different in each country. If you do not understand the rules of a country, this can cause problems. You can have bad ideas about people. And you can have problems understanding them. Business etiquette is the polite rules for how to act with other people. Here are three simple things about business etiquette. These things are different around the world. This information can help you a lot. It will help when you work with someone from a different country.

messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Today, a lot of business happens between different countries. Many business people speak English. But the way people talk for business is different in each country. If you do not understand these differences, this can cause problems. You can think wrong things about people. And you can have problems understanding them. Etiquette means the polite rules for how to act with other people. Business etiquette is about these rules for work. Here are three simple things about business etiquette around the world. This information can help you work with people from different countries.
